French authorities searched Huawei offices over financial wrongdoings - reportsChinese tech giant Huawei said on Thursday a search took place at its French office two days ago, confirming earlier reports from local media about a raid by France's PNF prosecution office linked to potential embezzlement charges. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 19:32:43 GMT 3RD4GVU7SRNQTITGQU5KW6FMMU https://www.reuters.com/technology/french-authorities-searched-huawei-offices-over-financial-wrongdoings-reports-2024-02-08/Reuters技术
US lawmakers accuse VC firms of funding Chinese military-linked firmsSequoia Capital China, Qualcomm Ventures and three other U.S. venture capital firms plowed at least $3 billion into Chinese tech companies that support Beijing's military and its repression of minorities in Xinjiang, a U.S. congressional report alleged on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 18:33:24 GMT JGX5DDUZARNEXNOQC64BE2MV4E https://www.reuters.com/business/us-lawmakers-accuse-vc-firms-funding-chinese-military-linked-firms-2024-02-08/Reuters商业
US lawmakers urge Commerce to put TikTok-parent ByteDance on export control listA group of 15 U.S. lawmakers on Thursday urged the Commerce Department to add TikTok's China-based parent company ByteDance to a government export control list to restrict its access to American software. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 18:07:19 GMT Z4SM2EGLXFOH5A6GWJ5SKB22XI https://www.reuters.com/technology/lawmakers-urge-commerce-put-tiktok-parent-bytedance-export-control-list-2024-02-08/David Shepardson可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
TikTok challenges EU supervisory fee, following Meta’s footstepsChinese online social media platform TikTok has challenged a supervisory fee amounting to 0.05% of its annual worldwide net income to cover EU regulators' costs of monitoring compliance with new EU rules, the second company to do so after Meta Platforms . Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:38:28 GMT C7ZAZBWGAFKO5IPZLFYCK4TDW4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-challenges-eu-supervisory-fee-following-metas-footsteps-2024-02-08/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Wu and Lombard share lead after first round in QatarChina's Ashun Wu and South African Zander Lombard carded five-under-par 67s to share the one-shot lead after the first round of the Qatar Masters on Thursday at the Doha Golf Club. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:33:24 GMT T5W2A62QCRJZPOPMCKECQXBLG4 https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/wu-lombard-share-lead-after-first-round-qatar-2024-02-08/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
US Senate advances $95 bln Ukraine, Israel aid bill after failed border dealA $95.34 billion bill that includes aid for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan advanced in the U.S. Senate on Thursday after Republicans blocked compromise legislation that included a long-sought overhaul of immigration policy. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:15:40 GMT 2OHFQCKNYFNKPN7TRFFXJWGARM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-vote-95-bln-ukraine-israel-aid-bill-after-failed-border-deal-2024-02-08/Patricia Zengerle, Richard Cowan, Makini Brice世界美国
Putin and Xi reject US 'interference', praise their own ties and trade - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:18:06 GMT X2NVIGZQYVNETKDM3K773G7RVU https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-xi-reject-us-interference-praise-their-own-ties-trade-kremlin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
Ralph Lauren rides strong holiday demand, China rebound to post upbeat resultsRalph Lauren beat profit expectations for the 14th straight quarter, driven by robust holiday demand for its pricey cashmere sweaters, coats and cocktail dresses in the U.S. and a strong rebound in China, sending its shares 14% higher on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:05:38 GMT 23EWM7TJZ5O6DHSMAWO5BLUGSI https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/ralph-lauren-tops-quarterly-sales-estimate-strong-demand-2024-02-08/Deborah Sophia商业零售与消费品
EU's Vestager doubts if Big Tech will fully comply with landmark EU rulesEU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager on Thursday voiced doubts as to whether Big Tech will fully comply with landmark EU rules aimed at reining in their power and ensure a level playing field for smaller rivals. Tapestry lifts 2024 profit forecast on China demand rebound, strong marginsCoach parent Tapestry raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, betting on full-price sales of its premium handbags as well as early signs of a demand recovery in key market China. China's Xi urges 'close strategic coordination' in call with PutinChina's President Xi Jinping told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the two countries should pursue close strategic coordination and defend the sovereignty, security and development interests of their respective countries, state media said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:35:35 GMT VXXJKPILGZNANHLPEK53EJTDCI https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-urges-close-strategic-coordination-call-with-putin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
